but I’m afraid that it would cause shit since I don’t really know what it does

item.title: Need some help with this
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

if (npcs[NPCID].actionTimer == 0) {
				if (false && (EnemyHP <= (int) ((double) ((double) EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5))) {
				} else {
					if (PlayerHandler.players[Player].deathStage > 0) {
						ResetAttackPlayer(NPCID);
					} else {
						if ( ....

As you can see this

if (false && (EnemyHP <= (int) ((double) ((double) EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5))) {
}

is just ridiculous

now I would just remove it, but doesn’t that wants to state if that ^ then nothing should happen,
so then should I have to leave it?

Or would i do this?

if (false && (EnemyHP <= (int) ((double) ((double) EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5)))
return;

Please some help, I’m mindfucked right here

Read full topic
